text: Robert Eugene Glennen, Jr., PhD (March 31, 1933 - December 1, 2015) was an American education administrator. He served as Emporia State University's thirteenth president in Emporia, Kansas. Before president of Emporia State, Glennen also served as the tenth president at Western New Mexico University, many administrative jobs at the University of Nevada, Las Vegas and the University of Notre Dame. Glennen was born in Billings, Montana. He died in Las Vegas, Nevada at the age of 82. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Academics from Montana Category:People from Billings, Montana Category:Educators from Las Vegas Category:Academics from Kansas
title: Robert E. Glennen
